name: myGDEX for WooCommerce
author: GDEX

sections.description:
myGDEX for WooCommerce is GDEX’s official extension for WooCommerce on WordPress. Manage your domestic and international shipments easily.

FEATURES
– Fast and easy consignment note creation of your domestic and international orders.
– Easily print out consignment note.
– Bulk Consignment Note Creation allows you to create consignment notes for multiple orders.
– Bulk Consignment Note Printing allows you to print multiple consignment notes.
– Get the latest shipment fee from myGDEX.
– Check your e-Wallet balance.
– Arrange for pick-up or lodge in your shipments.
– Check delivery status of your shipments.
– Check your invoices.
sections.installation:
1. Upload the plugin files to the /wp-content/plugins/ directory, or install the plugin through the WordPress plugins screen directly.

  2. Activate the plugin through the ‘Plugins’ screen in WordPress

  3. Under WooCommerce – Setting – Shipping – GDEX, key in your user token to use the plugin.

User Guide available at https://my.gdexpress.com/dashboard/ecommerceintegrationTutorial
sections.faq:
Can I Use This Plugin Without Being A myGDEX Member?

No. You need to be a valid myGDEX member to use this plugin. You can register to be a myGDEX member at https://my.gdexpress.com/
sections.changelog:
1.2.1

  • Compatible with WordPress 6.5.
  • Compatible with Woocommerce 8.7.

1.2.0

  • Add consignment ready email notification.
  • Compatible with WordPress 6.4.
  • Compatible with Woocommerce 8.3.

1.1.5

  • Compatible with WordPress 6.1.
  • Compatible with Woocommerce 7.2.

1.1.4

  • Improve Gdex API Server Error handling.

1.1.3

  • Fix WordPress Site Health warning.

1.1.2

  • Minor bug fixes.

1.1.1

  • Fix missing file issue.

1.1.0

  • For Woocommerce >= 5.8, passing order shipping phone as consignment receiver mobile instead of billing phone.
  • Compatible with Woocommerce 5.9.

1.0.7

  • Compatible with Woocommerce 5.8.
  • Fix retrieve country alpha3 code error.

1.0.6

  • Compatible with WordPress 5.8 and Woocommerce 5.5.
  • Change API endpoint to use https.

1.0.5

  • Compatible with WordPress 5.6 and Woocommerce 5.0.
  • Improve consignment status query.

1.0.4

  • Compatible with WordPress 5.5 and Woocommerce 4.6.
  • Fix consignment content for variable product.
  • Minor Bug fixes.

1.0.3

  • Compatible with WordPress 5.4 and Woocommerce 4.0.
  • Update Saturday pick up time slot.

1.0.2

  • Minor bug fixes.

1.0.1

  • Fix plugin name error.

1.0.0

  • First release.
